sentences.en: All the infected clothing was incinerated.
sentences.cn: 所有沾染了细菌的衣服都被焚化了。

sentences.en: Fixed a problem with melee units with Incinerate not damaging any units that they would Incinerate.
sentences.cn: 修正了有焚烧属性的肉搏单位不能伤害那些应该受到伤害的单位.

sentences.en: Glyph of Incinerate: Increases damage of Incinerate by 5 %.
sentences.cn: 烧尽雕文: 提升烧尽的伤害5%.

sentences.en: Incinerate fertilizer volatilizes nigrescent meeting flying.
sentences.cn: 灰化肥挥发发黑会飞花.

sentences.en: Incinerate has been moved to now require only 5 points in Fire talents instead of 10.
sentences.cn: 引燃被移到需要10点火系天赋,代替原来的5点.

sentences.en: Raj : Maybe so, but you can't incinerate a Bengal tiger with a magnifying glass.
sentences.cn: 也许是这样, 但是你不能用放大镜把一只孟加拉虎烧成灰.

sentences.en: That would incinerate incinerate the heart of a major city and.
sentences.cn: 那可能毁灭主要城市的中心.

sentences.en: That would incinerate the heart of the a major cities containcity.
sentences.cn: 它能够烧毁一座大型城市的中心地带.

sentences.en: The flames of my rage will incinerate you!
sentences.cn: 狂暴的火焰将把你熔为灰烬!

sentences.en: The Warlock spell Incinerate has had the performance of its graphical spell effect improved.
sentences.cn: 术士的“烧尽”法术的图象效果增强.

sentences.en: They also shoot inaccurate flaming balls wrapped in pitch - soaked rags, that can incinerate enemy troops!
sentences.cn: 也可以发射不精确的浸泡过树脂的易燃物火球, 把敌人烧成灰!

sentences.en: This monstrous flare would undoubtedly incinerate all life on the surface of the earth.
sentences.cn: 这种难以置信的突然爆发无疑会把地球表面的一切生命烧成灰烬.

sentences.en: Which is better to incinerate the rubbish from our towns or to tip it into disused quarries?
sentences.cn: 在我们城里把垃圾予以焚化，还是倒进废弃的采石坑，哪一种方法好？

trans.tran_en: to burn something completely in order to destroy it
to burn something completely in order to destroy it
